definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
letter/mail/CL:封[feng1]/to trust/to believe/to profess faith in/truthful/confidence/trust/at will/at random
China Telecom (Chinese company providing mobile phone service)

pinyin: gong1 zhong4 dian4 xin4 wang3 lu4
guo2 ji4 dian4 xin4 lian2 meng2
A1 la1 bo2 Dian4 xin4 Lian2 meng2

sentences.english: Communication with France was difficult during the telephone and postal strike.
sentences.chinese: 电信与邮政部门罢工期间，与法国通讯联系很困难。

sentences.english: In Ghana today, one in two people has access to telecom services.
sentences.chinese: 今天在加纳，每2人中就有1人使用电信服务。

sentences.english: If the above situation does not, you can apply to telecommunications.
sentences.chinese: 如果上面情况没有，也可以去电信局办理。

sentences.english: They are employed by telephone and other telecommunications transmission services establishments.
sentences.chinese: 他们受雇于电话和其他电信传输服务场所。

sentences.english: How to choose the standard access network which is consistent with carrier-grade?
sentences.chinese: 如何选择符合电信级标准的接入网络呢？

sentences.english: A wavelet-based electrocardiogram data semi-lossless compression algorithm was proposed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 提出了基于小波变换的心电信号准无损压缩算法。

sentences.english: Competing telcos are expanding the reach of FttX-based services.
sentences.chinese: 电信公司的竞争已经延伸到光纤到户为基础的服务。

sentences.english: Wireless carriers are also revamping their practices to deter infiltration.
sentences.chinese: 电信公司也改变了他们的习惯做法来阻止渗透活动。

sentences.english: I recently ordered Internet and phone service from the cable company.
sentences.chinese: 我最近从电信公司订购了互联网和电话服务。

sentences.english: Our reporter interviewed the Beijing university of posts and telecommunications and telecom engineering college professor Chen lei.
sentences.chinese: 本报记者采访了北京邮电大学电信工程学院教授陈磊。

sentences.english: “IT'S good to talk”, says the snappy slogan of a British telecoms company.
sentences.chinese: “聊天真好”，这句俏皮的广告语源自英国电信。

sentences.english: In short, telecommuting is still a job, so treat it as such.
sentences.chinese: 总之，电信办公仍是一个工作，所以理应如此对待它。

sentences.english: Now, Somalia has telecom services among the best inAfrica.
sentences.chinese: 如今，索马里有着非洲大陆最优质的电信服务。

sentences.english: Cords for telecommunication, construction, dimensions, representation for drawings.
sentences.chinese: 电信软线，结构，尺寸，图纸的表示法。

sentences.english: Broadcasting network and telecom network have similar techno-economical features.
sentences.chinese: 广电网络与电信网络具有相似的技术经济特性。

sentences.english: He had worked in the telecommunications industry for 11 years before being laid off.
sentences.chinese: 斯基莫尔在电信业服务了11年。

definition: China Telecom (Chinese company providing mobile phone service)
China United Telecommunications Corporation/aka China Unicom or Unicom/abbr. for 中國聯通|中国联通
China Netcom (CNC), former telecommunication service provider in PRC
operator (of a power station, transport network etc)/carrier (telecommunications etc)
China Mobile Tietong, state-owned telecommunications operator (abbr. for 中移鐵通|中移铁通[Zhong1 yi2 Tie3 tong1])

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Yi2 dong4 Tong1 xin4
